greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = number of functions from an n-element set into but not onto a k-element set.
link: D. P. Walsh, A note on non-surjective functions from [n] to [k].
formula: T(n,k) = sum((-1)^(j-1)*C(k,j)*(k-j)^n, j=1..k). - _Dennis P. Walsh_, Apr 13 2016
T(n,k) = k^n - k!*Stirling2(n,k). - _Dennis P. Walsh_, Apr 13 2016
maple: seq(seq(T(n, k), k=1..n), n=1..15); # _Dennis P. Walsh_, Apr 13 2016
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Nov 26 2004
ext: Offset corrected from 0 to 1. _Dennis P. Walsh_, Apr 13 2016
